content.title: SKADI Starter pack (dnd)
content.creator:
Skadi Studios
February 21, 2025
content.content:
A massive thank you to everyone who has joined us on this incredible journey so far! We’ve got some thrilling news: we’re adding four new miniatures and an epic role-playing adventure to all campaign rewards! These unique adventurers, each with their own character sheet, stats, and skills, are characters we absolutely adore!
Get ready for "The Island" – a captivating adventure that our long-time fans will definitely remember! We’re diving deep into the creative process, and while it’s proving to be a bit more complex than we anticipated, we promise it will be worth the wait. One day, we might share some of the wild and hilarious stories from behind the scenes of this adventure's creation.
Rest assured, once we wrap up this epic journey, every backer who has supported this campaign will receive the adventure. Exciting times are ahead!
The following elements will be added to all rewards:
Melany /adventurer /cursed human bard /character mini (.stl)
Urgot /adventurer/orc monk/ character mini (.stl)
Anthuan /adventurer /human fighter/ character mini (.stl)
Suamy / adventurer /elf druid/ character mini (.stl)
Tales of Tanamar "The Island" / RPG adcenture/ +50 pages/ 5E compatible (PDF)
